item.title: By: karima
item.dc:creator: karima
item.description: WOW! What a plethora of info about pizza. Recently read a review in "The New Yorker" about a truck that arrives daily at a specific coner in N.Y.C. The pizza is so heavenly that the reviewer states, "This is where God comes for pizza."
item.content:encoded: WOW! What a plethora of info about pizza. Recently read a review in “The New Yorker” about a truck that arrives daily at a specific coner in N.Y.C. The pizza is so heavenly that the reviewer states, “This is where God comes for pizza.”
